name: TokenFaucetProxyFactory
description: Stake Prize Pool Proxy Factory. Minimal proxy pattern for creating new TokenFaucet contracts.

eventDecorators.name: ProxyCreated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the implementation returned by the beacon is changed.

functionDecorators.name: claimAll
functionDecorators.description: Runs claim on all passed comptrollers for a user.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenFaucets
parameterDecorators.description: The tokenFaucets to call claim on.

parameterDecorators.name: _asset
parameterDecorators.description: The asset to disburse to users.

parameterDecorators.name: _measure
parameterDecorators.description: The token to use to measure a users portion.

parameterDecorators.name: _dripRatePerSecond
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of the asset to drip each second.

returnDecorators.description: A reference to the new proxied TokenFaucet.

functionDecorators.name: createAndDeposit
functionDecorators.description: Creates a new TokenFaucet and immediately deposits funds.

parameterDecorators.name: _asset
parameterDecorators.description: The asset to disburse to users.

parameterDecorators.name: _measure
parameterDecorators.description: The token to use to measure a users portion.

parameterDecorators.name: _dripRatePerSecond
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of the asset to drip each second.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of assets to deposit into the faucet.

returnDecorators.description: A reference to the new proxied TokenFaucet.

functionDecorators.name: instance
functionDecorators.description: Contract template for deploying proxied Comptrollers.
